content: {"name": "Open Hand Association (OHA)", "alternate_name": "", "description": "- Fridays schedules are not set unless the food is remaining over from Thurssday. please call ahead to confirm if food is available on other days", "email": "", "url": "https://www.aaopenhand.org/events", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "821 Lydig Avenue", "address_2": null, "city": "East Bronx", "state_province": "NY", "postal_code": "10462", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.854707, "longitude": -73.86324499999999}, "phones": [{"number": "(718) 913-2151", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "18:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Needs volunteers"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Open on holidays"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Client can visit: Once a week "}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Pet food upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required on site"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Distribution at corner of Lydig and Barnes"}, {"attribute_key": "INFO", "attribute_value": "Will be given a Pantry ID upon registration"}]}
